author: LinOnetwo
description: Default game for tw-gamification, a simple store to buy bonus for yourself, and you are the store keeper.
name: Ego Store Lite

Reality Action In the "TW Gamification" framework, Reality Actions are things you accomplish in the real world. In this plugin, reality actions will be displayed as punch buttons. This plugin does not contain reality actions, only the game interface part. You need to install some Reality Actions plugin to have pre-built punch buttons. For example, [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work]]. Of course you can also create your own reality actions using the form provided in the "Create" tag, similar to other gamified to-do apps on the market. The reality actions created by this plugin are compliant with the Gaming Tiddlywiki framework and can be used by other games under the Gaming Tiddlywiki framework. Since Tiddlywiki's ecosystem is interoperable, assets acquired within the game can be transferred to other games in the future. !! Commodities Similar to "Reality Action", this plugin also provides forms to display various purchasable goods. You can install merchandise designed by others by installing the plugin, or you can create your own merchandise using the forms provided in the "Create" tag, similar to other gamified to-do applications on the market. Created items are unique to this game and will not affect other games. !! Gameplay The gamification gameplay provided by this plugin is very simple, it simply provides the ability to record gold and experience values, and to purchase merchandise with gold. Merchandise can be created by yourself, or you can use the default ones that come with the game, or you can install a merchandise plugin from the plugin source that is adapted to this plugin. !! Share your punch cards and merchandise! You can package your tiddlers as plugins using the [[Gatha|https://tw-cpl.netlify.app/#kookma%2Fgatha]] plugin (see the international forum thread [[ Why Gatha is a Game Changer?|https://talk.tiddlywiki.org/t/why-gatha-is-a-game-changer/2397]]). Once packaged [[Submit to CPL|https://tw-cpl.netlify.app/#RegisterNewPlugins]], others can download the realistic actions and merchandise you've shared via CPL. If you're a web developer, you can also use the [[Modern.TiddlyDev|https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/Modern.TiddlyDev/]] framework. No matter what framework you use to develop your plugin, be careful to add `"parent-plugin":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification",` to the plugin information, i.e. add this plugin as a parent plugin, so that your plugin is more likely to be searched for by users of this plugin in the plugin source! $:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/ ! <> <> !! 现实动作 在「游戏太微」框架里，现实动作即你在现实世界里完成的事情。在本插件里，现实动作将展示为打卡按钮。 本插件不包含现实动作，只包含游戏界面部分。你需要安装一些现实动作插件，才会有预置的打卡按钮。例如[[林一二的早睡早起插件|$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work]]。 当然你也可以用「创建」标签页里提供的表单来创建自己的现实动作，类似市面上的其它游戏化待办应用。 本插件创建出的现实动作都是符合「游戏太微」框架标准的，可以被「游戏太微」框架下的其它游戏使用。由于太微的生态是打通的，游戏内获得的资产未来也可以转移到其它游戏里。 !! 商品 类似于「现实动作」，本插件也提供了表单展示各种可购买的商品。你可以通过装插件来安装别人设计的商品，也可以用「创建」标签页里提供的表单来创建自己的商品，类似市面上的其它游戏化待办应用。 创建出的商品是本游戏独有的，不会影响到别的游戏。 !! 游戏 本插件提供的游戏化玩法非常简单，就仅仅是提供了金币和经验数值记录，以及用金币购买商品的功能。商品可以自己创建，也可以使用游戏默认自带的，还可以从插件源里安装适配了本插件的商品插件。 !! 分享你的打卡和商品 你可以使用 [[Gatha|https://tw-cpl.netlify.app/#kookma%2Fgatha]] 插件将你的条目打包为插件（详见国际论坛帖子 [[ Why Gatha is a Game Changer?|https://talk.tiddlywiki.org/t/why-gatha-is-a-game-changer/2397]]）。打包后[[提交到 CPL|https://tw-cpl.netlify.app/#RegisterNewPlugins]]，其他人即可通过 CPL 下载你分享的现实动作和商品。 如果你是 Web 开发者，也可以用[[Modern.TiddlyDev|https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/Modern.TiddlyDev/]]框架。 不管是用什么框架开发插件，注意在插件信息里添加 `"parent-plugin": "$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification",`，即将本插件添加为父插件，这样在插件源里你的插件才更容易被其它本插件的用户搜到！
